message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 61
Word2Vec, more relationships
similarity is the basis of many associations that Word2vec can learn
the learned vectors can be visualized after dimensionality reduction 
(as t-SNE)
certain directions in the induced vector space specialize towards 
certain semantic relationships
e.g. male-female, gender and even country-capital relationships
61
speaker: SYSTEM
